ValidationRule.description: Pending Customer Status can only be selected when other status is Responded In Progress, Restoration Provided, Temp Solution Provided.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , 'Responded in Progress') || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , 'Restoration Provided') || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , 'Temp Sol. Provided')) && (ISCHANGED(Status) && TEXT(Status )='Pending Customer')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: please select the correct Status and Internal Status Combination
